statements: SELECT * FROM sales_analysis
SELECT product_name, order_total, order_date FROM sales_analysis
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, order_total FROM sales_analysis ORDER BY order_total DESC
SELECT product_name, customer_name, order_date FROM sales_analysis WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT AVG(order_total) AS avg_order_total FROM sales_analysis
SELECT * FROM sales_analysis WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, order_total FROM sales_analysis WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_total ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(order_total) AS total_spent FROM sales_analysis GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT product_name, customer_name, order_date FROM sales_analysis WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(order_total) AS avg_order_total, MIN(order_total) AS min_order_total, MAX(order_total) AS max_order_total FROM sales_analysis;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_name,customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000;
SELECT customer_name,order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id=orders.customer_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name,SUM(order_total) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id=orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name,orders.order_date,orders.order_total FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id=orders.customer_id WHERE orders.order_total IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Sales LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM Customers c JOIN Sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM RevenueTracking ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, revenue FROM RevenueTracking WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_name='VIP Customers'
SELECT product_name, category FROM PopularProducts WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT sale_date, total_amount FROM SalesAnalysis WHERE total_amount < 500 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM RevenueTracking ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM RevenueTracking GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_revenue > 1000
SELECT * FROM PopularProducts WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments JOIN SalesAnalysis ON CustomerSegments.customer_id = SalesAnalysis.customer_id
SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(s.sale_id) AS total_sales FROM CustomerSegments c LEFT JOIN SalesAnalysis s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM RevenueTracking ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, revenue FROM RevenueTracking WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, revenue, transaction_date FROM RevenueTracking WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, segment, segment_score FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY segment_score DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, customer_id, revenue FROM SalesAnalysis WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, revenue, transaction_date FROM RevenueTracking WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT segment, segment_score, customer_id FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT product_id, product_name, popularity_score FROM PopularProducts WHERE popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesAnalysis WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY revenue DESC, transaction_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM SalesAnalysis GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
